course.subject: ISOM
course.name: Analytics for Service Operations
course.description: This course focuses on concepts and tools that can generate operational excellence for the production and delivery of services across various industries including healthcare, ride-hailing, advertising, and various types of financial services. Unlike traditional product markets, a salient feature of these industries is that services are often intangible and not storable, and often high variable, which raises significant challenges in decision making. The goal of this course is to improve the understanding of these challenges and to learn how to overcome the obstacles with data-driven quantitative models. This course will introduce simple predictive and prescriptive methods that are useful in service operations. Students will also have the opportunity to apply these concepts in various service industries by conducting a group project.
course.prerequisites: ISOM 2700 AND ISOM 3710

reviews.author: GPA 2.7小隊
reviews.title: Project determines all and don't take if you get B- or below in ISOM 3710
reviews.comment_content:
Advanced Excel-Solver Course
Easy content but not useful for future career, I think a quiz can help student to understand more about the concept before they are working on project.

After finishing the course,
I have suggested the professor to allocate 20% of the course's to the quiz and he said this is a good idea.
reviews.comment_teaching:
3-hour Boring lecture and Shin speaks like a robot, but accpetable accent.

Remember, this course is unlike ISOM 3710 , it wont explain the excel's formula clearly and assume you are an excel expert.

I won't suggest you to register this course if no recording is provided. As Shin assumes that you are proficient at Excel's basic function and his pace of teaching is fast. Trust me , you will never understand what is going on if there is no recording provided.
reviews.comment_grading:
Fair and competitive grading

60% Assignment x 6 (above mean ~ 3/4%)
10% Participation ( Not given , but I asked several question in Project presentation)
30% Project ( Not given even I eamiled him personally , but my team is below mean based on comment)

Final grade : B+
reviews.comment_workload:
Really big workload as a 3 credit course

6 assignments of excel
1 project presentation with 25 minutes

Also , the workload is big if you have no recording.

reviews.author: Hangonpls
reviews.title: Good and chill course
reviews.comment_content:
Topics include:
-advanced excel and healthcare analytics
-recommendation system analytics
-pricing analytics
-queuing analytics
reviews.comment_teaching: Very good teaching! Professor is very cute also haha. One point is that the lecture may be a bit long for someone ( 3 hours ) and may fall asleep easily.
reviews.comment_grading: Good graded, mean is like B or B+  But many students get high marks in hw so group present determines all. Good luck!
reviews.comment_workload: 6 hw each 10% and a 30% group present. No midterm no final, a very chill course to be honest. You just need to finish all hw by deadline and you will be fine for the course.
